name: Cavern Fall
description:
-Submission To The 57th MiniJam-

You've fallen into the centre of a massive cavern. The roof slowly starts to collapse with you inside... Your goal is to escape via the fallen rocks left over from the collapse, but be wary of your current situation... 

= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = 

The theme for the jam was UNDERGROUND, alongside the limitation Your Game Must Take Place In One Room.

= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = 

Tip:

Didn't have time to implement a tutorial, so just gonna add it here,

You can Wall Jump by jumping next to a wall, pushing away from it, then moving back towards it midair and jumping again.

Music By:

Brink - Joshua McLean

Forest Of The King - Joshua McLean
